title: citta urudiyinri bhakti
sahitya:
citta urudiyinri bhakti nilaikkumO shrI mahAdEva guruvE


anupallavi

  pittu piDittalaiyum pEi manak-kuranginai saddamillAd-aDakki sAdhanam sheidiDum


caraNam    japa tapa dhyAnattAl samshayam siddhikka cancalamillAda samAdhiyilE irukka
shubha mangaLa jyOti svarUpattilE layikka shuddhaduriya shiva bhOga sukham pusikka
